pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cluster Evaluation on Graphs // Evaluates the stability and significance of clusters on 'igraph' graphs. Supports weighted and unweighted graphs. Implements the cluster evaluation methods defined by Arratia A, Renedo M (2021) doi:10.7717/peerj-cs.600. Also includes an implementation of the Reduced Mutual Information introduced by Newman et al. (2020).
